| History                 = Nü Flesh was a biotech-specialized splinter faction of [[Advanced Idea Mechanics (Earth-616)|A.I.M.]]. They kidnapped [[Wade Wilson (Earth-616)|Deadpool]] as part of a new product line, gene-pirating the merc's regenerating mutated flesh as biostock for a series of grotesque biodrones.

[[File:Nü Flesh (Earth-616) biodrones from Deadpool Annual Vol 4 1 001.jpg|thumb|left|Nü Flesh's biodrones]]
[[Livewires (Earth-616)|Project Livewires]] member [[Gothic Lolita (Earth-616)|Gothic Lolila]] infiltrated Nü Tech's production facility and rescued Deadpool from a sampling containment. Together, they made their way through Nü Flesh's drones to the vault containing a massive "biokaiju" drone scheduled to be released in order to wreak havoc in the city for a ramapage demo directed towards potential buyers.

Armed with a biogranade scavenged by Gothic Lolita from another A.I.M. faction, Deadpool was launched into the biokaiju's control biocore, unchaining an [[wikipedia:Apoptosis|apoptosis]] within the creature's body, which destroyed it.{{r|Deadpool Annual Vol 4 1}}
